text:
The elder,
To the lady chosen by God and to her children, whom I love in the truth—and not I only, but also all who know the truth—
speaker: Narrator

text: because of the truth, which lives in us and will be with us forever:
speaker: Narrator

text: Grace, mercy and peace from God the Father and from Jesus Christ, the Father’s Son, will be with us in truth and love.
speaker: Narrator

text: It has given me great joy to find some of your children walking in the truth, just as the Father commanded us.
speaker: Narrator

text: And now, dear lady, I am not writing you a new command but one we have had from the beginning. I ask that we love one another.
speaker: Narrator

text: And this is love: that we walk in obedience to his commands. As you have heard from the beginning, his command is that you walk in love.
speaker: Narrator

text: I say this because many deceivers, who do not acknowledge Jesus Christ as coming in the flesh, have gone out into the world. Any such person is the deceiver and the antichrist.
speaker: Narrator

text: Watch out that you do not lose what we have worked for, but that you may be rewarded fully.
speaker: Narrator

text: Anyone who runs ahead and does not continue in the teaching of Christ does not have God; whoever continues in the teaching has both the Father and the Son.
speaker: Narrator

text: If anyone comes to you and does not bring this teaching, do not take them into your house or welcome them.
speaker: Narrator

text: Anyone who welcomes them shares in their wicked work.
speaker: Narrator

text: I have much to write to you, but I do not want to use paper and ink. Instead, I hope to visit you and talk with you face to face, so that our joy may be complete.
speaker: Narrator

text: The children of your sister, who is chosen by God, send their greetings.
speaker: Narrator
